item.title: Imperfectly Indieweb
item.description: Updated <2022-11-02 Wed>: some edits for concision The asteroid hurtling toward Twitter last week forced many of us to look back on our digital lives. I reflected on my mistakes with perfectionism and proprietorship, and am looking to Indieweb for solutions. Portrait of 1990s geekery # Figure 1: Dinosaur fossil by Nigel Holt, licensed under CC BY 2.0 The Wayback Machine has preserved my juvenilia. The soft tissue is gone, but here is the skeleton of a twentieth-century personal web page, the author not yet twenty.
